Another movie I would suggest is "TRON: Legacy". It is an action sci-fi film set in the year 2538 on a planet called Gliese 570. The film features a young man named Kevin (played by Sam Worthington) who discovers that he has been living inside a computer program called TRON. Kevin learns from his mentor, Diggy (played by Jeff Bridges)), that the only way to escape Tron is to create a perfect copy of oneself within Tron itself.

Based on the given user preference cues, I would recommend "300" as a potential recommendation.
The movie is about the battle of Thermopylae between Athens and Sparta in 480 BC. The movie has received positive reviews from critics and audiences alike. The movie has also won several awards including Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film, Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film, and Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Cast in a Motion Picture.
